headline: Midland Manufacturing Launches New Gauge Device Online Tool for Railcar Industry
summary: Midland Manufacturing, part of OPW's Fluid Transfer Solutions business unit and Dover (NYSE: DOV), today announced the launch of its Gauge Device Online Tool, which enables railcar manufacturers and repair shops to manage gauge devices via desktop computer or mobile device.
